message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $190. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $190 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $120 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $155?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $155 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
